data.text: Yaa Waaqayyo, ani kooluu sitti galeera;
Qajeelummaa keetiin na baasi; na oolchis;
Ati kattaa ani kooluu itti galu,
Yaa Waaqa ko, harka nama hamaa,
Yaa Waaqayyo Gooftaa, ati abdii kootii;
Ani gaafan dhaladhee jalqabee sitti irkadheera;
Ani namoota baayʼeedhaaf mallattoo taʼeera;
Afaan koo guyyaa guutuu,
Yeroo ani dulloomutti ati na hin gatin;
Diinonni koo natti mariʼatuutii;
Isaanis, “Waaqni isa dhiiseera;
Yaa Waaqi, narraa hin fagaatin;
Warri na himatan qaanaʼanii haa badan;
Ani garuu yeroo hundumaa abdii qaba;
Ani yoo hammam akka inni gaʼu beekuu baadhe illee,
Yaa Waaqayyo Gooftaa, ani dhufee
Yaa Waaqi, ati ijoollummaa kootii jalqabdee na barsiifteerta;
Yaa Waaqayyo, yeroo ani dulloomee mataan koo arrii taʼutti illee,
Yaa Waaqi, qajeelummaan kee samiiwwan bira gaʼa;
Ati rakkinaa fi dhiphina baayʼee na argisiifteerta;
Ulfina koo ni guddifta;
Yaa Waaqa ko, ani amanamummaa keetiif,
Yommuu ani faarfannaa galataa siif faarfadhutti, hidhiin koo,
Warri na miidhuu barbaadan,
